pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Variable Selection with Exponential Squared Loss // Computationally efficient tool for performing variable selection and obtaining robust estimates, which implements robust variable selection procedure proposed by Wang, X., Jiang, Y., Wang, S., Zhang, H. (2013) doi:10.1080/01621459.2013.766613. Users can enjoy the near optimal, consistent, and oracle properties of the procedures.
